Text: Augusta National Golf Club:  Since 1934, it has played host to the annual Masters Tournament, one of the four major championships in professional golf, and the only major played each year at the same course.

Text: Augusta National Golf Club:  It was the number one ranked course in "Golf Digest"<nowiki>'</nowiki>s 2009 list of America's 100 greatest courses and is currently the number ten ranked course on "Golfweek Magazine"' s 2011 list of best classic courses in the United States, in terms of course architecture.
